body_html:
Hi @aselle :
I have tried to reinstall tensorflow from compiling the source, but it did not work. I do not why, but I noticed that tensorflow can be installed by pip with CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN v5.1. It works for me.
I tried to upgrading my version of bazel and got the different error.
Although pip works for me, but I still do not know why does the my tensorflow crash?
I will close this issue, if anyone need it, I will reopen it.
Thanks for your time and help!

body:
Hi @aselle :
I have tried to reinstall tensorflow from compiling the source, but it did not work. I do not why, but I noticed that tensorflow can be installed by pip with CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN v5.1. It works for me.
I tried to upgrading my version of bazel and got the different error.
Although pip works for me, but I still do not know why does the my tensorflow crash?
I will close this issue, if anyone need it, I will reopen it.
Thanks for your time and help!
